content.beforeYourBegin: Before you begin you should consider how you'll divide your money and property when you divorce. You can make the division legally binding with a 'financial order'.
content.youNeedToGet: You need to get a financial order if you:
content.haveNothingToSplit: have nothing to split but want to make your financial separation final
content.agreeOnHowYouWant: agree on how you want to share your money and property and want to make that legally binding
content.disagreeOnTheSplit: disagree on the split and want the court to settle the dispute
content.youShouldReadMore: You should read more about financial orders before you continue as you'll be asked if you want to apply for one later in this application.
